name: Cometa IoT Platform
body:
### Cometa Documentation

[Cometa API] (http://www.cometa.io/cometa-api.html)

Reference to HTTP and WebSocket Cometa API. The document describes the Cometa HTTP REST and WebSocket API to use in a Web or mobile application to interact with remote IoT devices using the Cometa platform.

[Performance Benchmarks](benchmarks.md)

Summary of performance benchmarks data for Cometa.

### Contact
[Contact us](http://www.cometa.io/index.html#contact)
[Cometa website](http://www.cometa.io)
